epic.title: Idea Generation
epic.description: Create and deliver functionality for generating random app ideas based on user-selected categories or themes.

stories.title: Random App Idea Generator Feature
stories.description: Implement a feature that allows users to select one or more categories and generate random app ideas with a title and short description.
acceptanceCriteria: User can select one or more categories from a predefined list.
System generates at least one unique app idea for every request.
Generated idea includes a title and a short description.
Idea generation response time is under 2 seconds.
Feature is accessible on both mobile and web platforms.

tasks.title: Design category selection UI
tasks.description: Create wireframes and UI components for users to select one or more categories from a predefined list.

tasks.title: Implement category database
tasks.description: Set up and populate database with predefined categories and themes.

tasks.title: Develop randomization algorithm
tasks.description: Create algorithm to generate unique app ideas based on selected categories.

tasks.title: Integrate idea generation API
tasks.description: Connect frontend selection to backend idea generator and return ideas to UI.

tasks.title: Optimize response time
tasks.description: Ensure the complete generation process returns results under 2 seconds.

tasks.title: Cross-platform testing
tasks.description: Test feature for compatibility and usability across mobile and web platforms.

notes: The user request was vague; assumed the need is for an app that generates app ideas. Categories and themes can be expanded later.
